name: Transitional Elements
description:
Description: 

Post-game jam goals:

  • Difference between melee attack
  • More animations
  • Stage design (add cover, barrier, etc.)
  • Add sound effects
  • Animate the golems
  • Unique attack combos

Fight 3 bosses at once as you move between the world of fire, water, and grass. You can capture and utilize each element in order to gain an advantage against either boss. The boss stage (and the boss) can change, so take full advantage of it!

Control scheme:

WASD = movement

Left click = Melee

Right click = Ranged

B = switch element

X = switch stage

Credits:
